• Developed 10+ fully functional applications for Android devices, 5+ landed to Play Store. 
• Expert in the interaction between various devices and versions of Android. 
• Proficient understanding of Google’s Material Design principles and interface guidelines. 
• Expert in translating any designs and wireframes into high-quality code. 
• Working Knowledge of Fragments, Service, Intents, Broadcast Receivers, Content Providers, JSON, Gson, REST API’s, Data Binding in Android. 
• Advance Android development using Rxjava2, Dependency Injection(Dagger2, Butterknife), EventBus(GreenRobot), Kotlin. 
• Memory mgmt and optimization using Threading, Asynctask, Leakcanary, Yourkit. 
• Working knowledge of Android MVP, MVVM(Data Binding) architecture. 
• Hands on experience of Proguard, Google Analytics, Firebase, ACRA. 
• Proficient in integrating SDK like. FCM, Facebook Graph, One signal. 
• Used Android Database SQLite, Room, Realm, GreenDao. 
• Backend development using Laravel/Lumen Framework with PHP. 
• Basic knowledge of Automated unit testing, Functional testing (Espresso, Appium, Mockito).

A FORWARD-THINKER TECHNOLOGY ENTHUSIAST DEVELOPER HAVING MORE THAN 4 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN DEVELOPING MOBILE and WEB ENTERPRISE APPLICATIONS. EXPERIENCE IN FOUNDING STARTUP, LEADING A TECHNICAL TEAM. EX-IBMER, TCSER.


 SOLID UNDERSTANDING OF FULL MOBILE AND SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT LIFE CYCLES, UIX, WEB ANALYTICS, CHANGING WEB STANDARDS, AND AGILE METHODOLOGIES. DEDICATED TO CONTINUOUSLY DEVELOPING, IMPLEMENTING, AND ADOPTING NEW TECHNOLOGIES TO MAXIMISE DEVELOPMENT EFFICIENCY AND PRODUCE INNOVATIVE APPLICATIONS.


 ACTIVELY LOOKING FOR NEW OPPORTUNITIES TO LEVERAGE MY EXPERIENCE IN THE STARTUP WORLD.
